title.0: Nvidia CES 2023 live: will we see the rumored RTX 4070 Ti?
title.2: Nvidia makes the RTX 4070 Ti official for $100 less than the canceled 12GB 4080

description.0: Nvidia is at CES 2023 and our live blog will bring you all of the big announcements as they come! Will we see the RTX 4070 Ti?
description.1: How did Nvidia fare over the past year? Strap yourself in tight, because the ride’s a bumpy one…
description.2: Specs and performance are identical to Nvidia's "unlaunched" 4080 variant.
